snippet.title: DRC Gameplay Trailer - Envy Arena
snippet.description:
Official Demons Are Crazy's gameplay trailer, featuring our pure-joy-intense-action combat as any MOBA should be. These are honest raw footage taken from one of our seven-sin arenas, Envy Forest. The gpu used was simple GeForce GTX960. No staging or editing, so this (or probably better than this) is what our players should see/play.

Thanks for all our amazing beta players for helping out. You guys are super amazing as usual. :)
